text:
Infanta Sofía of Spain (Sofía de Todos los Santos de Borbón y Ortiz; born 29 April 2007) is the second child of King Felipe VI and Queen Letizia. She was born at Ruber International Hospital in Madrid, She was baptized at Palace of Zarzuela in Madrid.
She has an older sister, Leonor, whom she follows in the line of succession to the Spanish throne.

annotations.surface_form: line of succession to the Spanish throne
